data.name: Minion's Dollar Box
data.description:
Minion wants to save some dollars out of his monthly paycheck in a box. He hires you to design the box.
The amount of dollar Minion wants to save vary monthly. Every month, he specify you the  height, width and outline of the box required for the month.

For example, this month Minion wants a box of height 5, width 5 and outline *
    
    dollarBox(5,5,"*")
 		
Below, is how the box should look like after Minion puts in his money,
 
 		*****
 		*$$$*
 		*$$$*
 		*$$$*
 		*****	
  		
 Remember, some months Minion spends all his money and go broke,
 But still he wants you to design a box with no space to keep the dollars, For Example:

 		  dollarBox(2,2,"#")
  		
 Below is how the box should look like
  
  		##
  		##	
 
ASSUMPTIONS: Height and width is always an integer greater than zero and symbol is a string either "#" or "*"
